data.text:
Absolutely. If you just
                      chop up any kind of vegetable, let's say it's
                      cabbage and carrot, so you cut it up. You massage
                      it with salt and some spices until their juice
                      comes out. You press it down so all the vegetables
                      are covered with its own juice. Three days later,
                      you have perfect fermented sauerkraut.
